Reviews.Title: Do not buy
Reviews.Author: hannah
Reviews.Content: Phone arrived on time but after an hour out of the box was stuck in dock mode turned it off for the night as not to want to worry about it then in the morning I go to plug it in and it doesn't turn on. Will be returning and buying from someone else.

Reviews.Title: great phone!
Reviews.Author: jamie
Reviews.Content: It looks and acts like a brand new phone, i love it! The battery life on this is pretty good too, i am able to only charge it every other day, only if im not on it all day, standby time is awesome! i highly recommend!

Reviews.Title: Great phone really
Reviews.Author: Eduardo Mariano
Reviews.Content: The phone has a great screen, excellent sound, the battery life is much better than other teams, the camera can shoot good photos.

Reviews.Title: Great Phone, I didn't know what I was missing of using android
Reviews.Author: Mario Canelon
Reviews.Content: Great Phone, I didn't know what I was missing of using android instead of Blackberry excellent product Buy It for sure.

Reviews.Title: best phone ever
Reviews.Author: mom12
Reviews.Content: This phone is great.  The screen gives a great, clear picture. the audio is clear and loud and feels as if you were in a movie almost. the camera takes wonderful pictures, as sharp as any $200 camera would do. not to mention all of the apps and other many conveniences such as just being pretty much everything you can want in a little device that you can take with you to the store, to exercise, to run errands, get directions, Skype, etc...It's light, it fits in my hand, it's easy to set up. the only thing that's a little disappointing is the battery life. for a phone that can do everything, it doesn't last long once you start doing everything on it.This seller seems reputable as the phone they sent me looks exactly as pictured and is exactly as described. it was unlocked and worked.
